name: idahoan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Idaho: He plays a geeky Idahoan in the teen movie Napoleon Dynamite. She's an Idahoan and shares the values of many other Westerners.
More examplesFewer examplesHe would be the longest-serving Idahoan ever in Congress.The monument is an easy trip for an Idahoan with a free afternoon.Many Easterners think it's easy for an Idahoan to be embarrassing.

belonging or relating to the US state of Idaho or its people: The Idahoan mine is still a large producer of good-grade ore. Kennedy had a lot of influence with Idahoan politicians.
More examplesFewer examplesLana Turner was an Idahoan actress. He lives in the Idahoan capital, Boise.The trail winds through the Idahoan countryside on its way toward Washington state.
